synopsis: In episode #11 titled 'SOLOOOO', Ahir shares a deeply personal journey of dealing with a knee injury while exploring themes of self-acceptance, loneliness, and the importance of emotional intelligence. Through engaging storytelling and thoughtful reflections, he encourages listeners to embrace their own experiences and find joy in the process of living authentically.
quotes: The way you live your life every day is how you end up living your life.
Are you able to be okay by yourself? Will you still live your life?
It's a beautiful thing to recognize that loneliness and melancholy are beautiful feelings.
The ability to love and be loved does exist; you just may not be able to feel it for a bit.
Cooking isn't that hard; ingredients are like colors, just figure out what goes together.
You have to give yourself small acts of happiness; a couple of cocoa in the morning can start your day right.
It's easy to blame other people and it's easy to blame yourself, but both are about controlling the narrative.
You can only do so much; some things you can't fix with hard work.
Open your arms if you want to be held; what's the worst that could happen?
Love is a choice, but you have to pick loving yourself over loving someone else for the really big things.
